item.description:
This will be an intimate community building experience for you, fellow Boston Volunteers.

 

Many of the Boston Volunteers leaders will be there too.

 

It will be a great opportunity for you to

1. Meet new people who share your values

2. Enjoy refreshing spirits

3. Bowl!

 

Talent not required. I am a beginner!

 

We anticipate bowling with you, :)
Josh

 

The Boston Volunteers
Big enough to Deliver, small enough to care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org


P.S. Learn more about your fellow Boston Volunteers: http://www.facebook.com/BostonVolunteers

P.P.S. Many Boston Volunteers are friending our friend, the popular Paulette.
Who is Paulette: http://www.facebook.com/paulette.revere.7
item.how_to_find_us: I will provide my cell phone number for you.

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Bowling at Kings. Community building fun! :)
